task.title: Blueberry Oatmeal Waffles for Mom
task.shortdesc: For this recipe, Mom will need the following: 2/3 cups all purpose flower, ½ cup cup quick-cooking oats, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, ½ teaspoon salt, 2/3 cup milk, 1 egg, ¼ cup canola oil, teaspoon lemon juice, ¼ cup ground pecans, and ½ cup fresh or frozen blueberries.

step.cmd: In a bowl, combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, baking poweder and salt. Combine the milk, egg, oiul and lemon juice; stir into dry ingredients and mix well. Add in pecans and blueberries. Let stand for 5 minutes
Bake in our waffle iron until golden brown. This will make two 6 inch waffles.
